description: No Dealer Fees! Need a Used Car? OffLeaseOnly.com has THOUSANDS of used cars all priced THOUSANDS below retail with no stress of negotiating price and no commissioned sales people. THIS VEHICLE IS PRICED $5,302 BELOW THE MARKET AVERAGE*!  Fantastic Performance! One Owner, Silver with Beige Leather, Turbo, Rear view Camera, Power Drivers Seat, Fog Lamps, Rear Parking Aid, Remote Engine Start, Rear Spoiler, Luggage Rack, Dual A/C, Power Mirrors, Bluetooth Connection, Auxiliary Audio In, Satellite Radio, CD player, Steering Wheel Audio Control, 17''Alloy Wheels, Tire Pressure Monitor System, Power Windows and Locks, Cruise Control and Tilt Steering, Automatic, *** PREVIOUS ACCIDENT *** Car Looks New, Must See! Need Financing? Banks compete hard to earn our customers business by aggressively working to get you the lowest possible interest rate available. Get Instant Financing online now with approved credit prior to even stepping foot onto any of our dealerships.  We want your trade! Get the KBB Trade-in Value on your vehicle right on OffLeaseOnly.com in a matter of a minute! Also make sure to ask about the available tax credits when trading in your vehicle and purchasing another one from us.  Want additional peace of mind? Extended Service Agreements are available up to 7 years and/or 150,000 miles from your date of purchase. Please feel free to have your car inspected prior to purchase by your own mechanic as well.  Read our Reviews! We are proud to have over 150,000 Happy Customers Worldwide! OffLeaseOnly is A+ Rated on the BBB, DealerRater's Used Car Dealer of The Year for the Entire USA & Edmunds Five-Star Dealer of the Year. Ship Your Car! Out of area customers now can have vehicles shipped right to their front door!
title: 2014 Ford Escape SE
